segments.text: Mr . Lee , I was wondering if you and your wife had plans for next Friday night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think we might be free . What did you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've mailed a formal written invitation to your home inviting you to a dinner party at my home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds great . Is it casual ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , we thought it would be fun to have a formal sit-down dinner for the holidays .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds good . It will give my wife a chance to dress up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we've invited four other couples , so it should be a good mix of people .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds wonderful . Will there be anyone there that I know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh yes , everyone we are inviting is from our company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! I'll look forward to it . We'll make sure and check the mail for our invitation .
segments.speaker: S2
